summary: Three pairs of reincarnated lovers reunite in the present day -- but the men wind up falling for the wrong women.

reviews.content: Only worth the watch if you want to see the fresh faces and a very different storyline, but the end result is still pretty disappointing.

A film that's very badly made. It's vulgur at times and absolutely illogical and formulaic but for me it works as a guilty pleasure so I can watch it multiple times and laugh at its absurdity while criticizing it as well.
It was funny and so amazing
It's an absolute pathetic film , just a time waste. I feel like why did I watch this rubbish. Is movie ko na apni gaand main daal lo (take this up you ass).It's so bad.

'Hkusefull 4' is going to be a bad comedy of errors and we just knew that. But this is another level of shit. It's place is confirmed in the list of worst Hindi films of 2019 and also the decade, but the performances and the blatant women-selling this film does needs a slap- a hard, tight slap. The manipulative emotional chord never lands in providing for a forgettable laugh- or two, but other than Akshay Kumar's below-average screen presence, nothing can come to salvage this sloppy film that trips over the first second. No reason for the idea, forget the fourth film. You don't have to suffer this one.
It is the most disgusting disgrace movie i have ever seen
In the name of comedy, akshay kumar is trying to sell his third class performance, Wast of time

This movie provides a lot of humor and an exceptional story line. It doesn't deliver much entertainment than it's predecessors but will still make you feel like your money was worth it.

This is a meme movie that is just meant for passing time, and that is precisely what it is good at. The CGI is pretty bad, the acting is bad, the jokes are bad (but sometimes funny) and this isn't even the best Housefull movie, but it's still overall kinda funny.
